sections.name: page_1
pages: ["",{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"A Tinkering Compressor with 64 items inside will tinker compress items on top of it, transforming them into their block form. It supports the same conversions as the Tinker Shamir.\n\nPlacing 1 item inside will instead detinker any items on top of it."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.tinkering_compressors.2"}]}]
